character.name: Maginot
character.desc:
<c=d5c58a>MAGINOT</c>
Your military advisor. His cards bring a lot of shield and midrow objects, with a dash of midrow ignoring weapons.

maginotShip.name: Excelsior
maginotShip.desc: Equiped with powerful but fragile intermix power generators in each wings, this ship is the definition of a glass cannon.

artilleryBank.name: Artillery Bank
artilleryBank.desc: Gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=card>Artillery Shell</c> at the start of every turn.

autoShield.name: Auto Shield
autoShield.desc: Gains <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>SHIELD</c> at the start of every turn.

autoTempShield.name: Auto Temp.Shield
autoTempShield.desc: Gains <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> at the start of every turn.

activeShielding.name: Active Shielding
activeShielding.desc: Gains 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> each time this ship is about to be hit. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at end of turn. Trigger only ONCE on multi-strike.</c>

NastySurprise.title: Nasty Surprise
NastySurprise.description: Instantly turn every <c=midrow>object in the midrow</c> into <c=drone>mines</c>.

ArtilleryAttack.title: Artillery Attack
ArtilleryAttack.description:
Attack that bypass any <c=midrow>midrow object</c> on its path.
Bypassing a midrow object increase the attack damage by <c=keyword>1</c>.
Bypassed <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> can't react to this attack.

description.None: Add three <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Add four <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.B: Add three <c=card>Artillery Shell A</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c> and two to the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +1 for every time played this combat.
description.A:
Draw 1.
Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +1 for every time played this combat.
description.B: Artillery <c=keyword>{0}</c>. +2 for every time played this combat.

Pavis.name: Pavis
Pavis.description: Temporary Shield = total dmg of enemy's cannon attack: <c=keyword>{0}</c>.

MilitaryDiscount.name: MILITARY DISCOUNT
MilitaryDiscount.desc: Gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> the first time per turn you spend 2+ energy playing a <c=d5c58a>MAGINOT</c> card.

TrenchWarfare.name: TRENCH WARFARE
TrenchWarfare.desc: Four <c=drone>Asteroids</c> will always be near your ship at the start of combat.

ActiveShielding.name: ACTIVE SHIELDING
ActiveShielding.desc: If you end your turn with more than 0 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, gain 1 <c=status>ACTIVE SHIELDING</c>.

AutoCannon.name: AUTO CANNON
AutoCannon.desc: Every 6 gain of <c=status>SHIELD</c>, gain an <c=card>Artillery Shell</c>.

SafetyFuse.name: SAFETY FUSE
SafetyFuse.desc: Reduce <c=drone>Mines</c>' damage to 0 when you destroy them. <c=downside>(Can still trigger weak!)</c>

MedalOfHonor.name: MEDAL OF HONOR
MedalOfHonor.desc: After gaining <c=status>SHIELD</c>, if you are at maximum shield, draw a card. Up to 3 times per turn.

MomentumCollector.name: MOMENTUM COLLECTOR
MomentumCollector.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c> every time a <c=drone>Mine</c> is destroyed.

IntermixChamber.name: INTERMIX CHAMBER
IntermixChamber.desc: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Your ship's wings become <c=parttrait>brittle</c> at the start of combat.</c>

ReinforcedIntermixChamber.name: REINFORCED INTERMIX CHAMBER
ReinforcedIntermixChamber.desc:
Replaces <c=artifact>INTERMIX CHAMBER</c>.
Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Your ship's wings become <c=parttrait>weak</c> at the start of combat.</c>
